resources.string: "Sarrafa mu'amula na sa ku kasance cikin mai da hankali a kan manhaja guda ɗaya ta toshe Komawa Gida Baya, da kuma maɓallai na yanzu , har da ma kire-kire masu shigowa da kuma sanarwa. Kuna iya kuma zaɓar ko ku toshe Madanni na gefe, Madannin daidaita murya, da kuma allon madannai, ku kuma toshe taɓawa daga kowane yanki da allon sikirin."
Kunna gajerar hanyar da ke kasa.
"A lokacin da kuke amfani da manhajar da kuke son ku mai da hankali akai, yi amfani da gajerar hanya don sake sarrafa ma'uamuloli."

"Sarrafa mu'amula na sa ku kasance cikin mai da hankali a kan manhaja guda ɗaya ta toshe Komawa Gida Baya, da kuma maɓallai na yanzu , har da ma kire-kire masu shigowa da kuma sanarwa. Kuna iya kuma zaɓar ko ku toshe maɓallin Gefe, Maɓallin Murya, da kuma allon madannai, ku kuma toshe taɓawa daga kowane yanki da allon sikirin."

One battery cycle refers to the use (discharging) of an amount that is equal to 100% of the battery capacity. (A cycle can add up at different intervals due to discharging and charging at different battery levels, for example, using up 60% of the battery on one day, then recharging fully and using 40% the next day. When the two add up to 100%, this is considered to be one battery cycle.)
Accumulated battery cycle information currently used

"Your mobile device is designed to not exceed the limits for exposure to radio waves recommended by international guidelines. The guidelines were developed by an independent scientific organization (ICNIRP) and include a substantial safety margin designed to assure the safety of all persons, regardless of age and health.
The radio wave exposure guidelines use a unit of measurement known as the Specific Absorption Rate, or SAR. The SAR limit for mobile devices is 2.0 W/kg. Body-worn SAR testing has been carried out at a separation distance of 0.5 cm. To meet RF exposure guidelines during body-worn operation, the device should be positioned at least this separation distance away from the body.
For SAR values specific to your model, visit %s."

"Galaxy AI's advanced intelligence features use powerful machine learning technology to let you do more than ever before with your Galaxy devices. You can translate phone calls in real time, generate summaries of notes and webpages, edit photos in amazing new ways, and more."

"Privacy, security, and user control are core principles of Galaxy AI's advanced intelligence features. You always have full control over when Galaxy AI's advanced intelligence features are used and how they process your data."

All data used for advanced intelligence training comes from ethical sources. No personal or private information is used for this training, and we obtain permission from copyright holders before using any copyrighted material.

Advanced intelligence features only work when you allow them by tapping a button or turning them on in Settings. Advanced intelligence features never access your data automatically or in the background without your permission.

"To provide the best experience, we work with partner companies who are world-leaders in the field of generative intelligence. Like us, our partners only use your data to generate a response for the feature you're using. Your data is never used for machine learning or for targeting ads. Your data is immediately deleted from our servers or our partner's servers as soon as generation is complete."

"Advanced intelligence features include safeguards to ensure generated content doesn't include anything that may be inappropriate or harmful. Images edited with AI will include a watermark to show that the image may not be depicting something that exists in the real world."

"While we believe our strict data processing policies protect your privacy at all times, we also offer the option to prevent online processing for all of Galaxy AI's advanced intelligence features. You won't be able to use features that require online processing if Process data only on device is turned on."
Get the most out of your phone with these advanced intelligence features from Samsung.
